trends: There have been 106 other sightings in Colorado Springs
There were no other sightings in Colorado Springs on or around June 22nd 2007
Summary: Saw it in the sky while going to Chow Hall.
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was 7:oo in the morning when i was walking with my peers to the Chow Hall in the mountians of Larkspur Colorado.It was somewhat misty outside and a bit chilly.I was currently going to a private school for boys at the Emily Griffith Center for children and young adults.Everyday before a meal,my peers and i would have to walk in strict line transitions to the cafeteria from our lodge.One morning,as we stood in line in front of the cafeteria,i decided to look up at the misty sky and saw a shiny silver egg shaped thing about 100 to 200 feet above us.It was floating completely still and made no niose at all.I stood there mystified and wondered what it could be.I watched this thing for a good 5 or 7 minutes when it suddenly zipped away into the sky,like a bullet.I say bullet because that is the only way that i can describe the speed in wich it shot away.When that happened i started to tell my peers,but nobody saw what i saw.Seeing this thing totally shocked and excited me.I couldnt stop talking about it all through breakfast.I had a gut feeling right away that this was a UFO,once it had zipped away into the atmosphere.About 2 hours later,during our field activity,i was even more wierded out,when black helocopters Circled over our campus for a good 30 to 45 minutes.I was somewhat skeptical about these sort of things until this happened,but not anymore.
